timeline.message:
ascanrules Beta: ScanRule Consistency

- Scan Rule class names.
- Unit Test class names.
- Message.properties keys (and some values).
- Help content.
- Remove boilerplate JavaDoc.

Part of: zaproxy/zaproxy#6049

Signed-off-by: kingthorin <kingthorin@users.noreply.github.com>

timeline.bodyText: The ScanRule was moved to the middle.
timeline.author: thc202
thc202
thc202
